Text: Thanks for collecting this all in one place each week.  Makes it very convenient.  Anybody know why the files sizes keep getting bigger and bigger?  It's getting kind of unwieldy.
guess what shadowpdf, this is the smallest file size for a New 52 Week torrent in the last 9 weeks.
Thanks, bro! Agree with you, never liked the Ravagers, and Team 7 was ok, but i just stoped reding it, wasn't really feeling it. Deathstroke was fun, kind of slow and repetitive, but fun,

Just a heads up... GL Corps 20 is epilogue to the First Lantern story that concludes in GL 20 - which doesn't come out till May 22. DC stuff-up again.

Thanks though.

I think it's time to use a better image format.
I suggest using webp, files are 50% smaller for the same quality.
webp is now supported by cdisplayex !
